meanings.definition: To a very great extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: She vastly improved her grades after studying hard.
meanings.sent2: The team vastly outperformed their opponents in the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cat vastly increased its speed when chasing a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: His confidence vastly soared after receiving positive feedback.
meanings.sent5: The sun vastly brightened the sky with its golden rays.

meanings.definition: In a vast manner; very greatly.
meanings.sent1: The forest stretched vastly in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The population of the city grew vastly over the years.
meanings.sent3: The cake was vastly devoured by the hungry children at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room vastly, spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The mountain loomed vastly in the distance, casting a shadow over the valley.
